Looking at your photo, most of the detergents are Thai market brands like **Breeze, Attack, USA, Downy, Pao,** etc. For **colored clothes**, the main things you want are:  

‚úÖ **No bleach** ‚Üí Bleach can strip color.  
‚úÖ **Color care / anti-fade formula** ‚Üí Keeps clothes bright.  
‚úÖ **Liquid is often gentler** on colors than powder, but both can work if labeled for colors.  

### Good picks from the shelf:

3. **Downy with Fabric Softener** ‚Äì softer on fabrics, though not as strong on heavy stains, but good for keeping colors vibrant.  

‚ö†Ô∏è Avoid: anything marked *Whitening* or *Bleach* ‚Äî those are aimed at white clothes only.

import qrcode
from PIL import Image

# URL for Marouch Restaurant on Google Maps
url = "https://maps.app.goo.gl/PR3BuTBaG8phgrP86"

# Generate QR code
qr = qrcode.QRCode(version=1, box_size=10, border=4)
qr.add_data(url)
qr.make(fit=True)

# Create image
img = qr.make_image(fill="black", back_color="white")
qr_path = "/mnt/data/marouch_qr.png"
img.save(qr_path)

qr_path
'/mnt/data/marouch_qr.png'

from PIL import Image, ImageDraw, ImageFont
import textwrap

# We'll create a sequence of cards as static frames and then compile into a GIF.

# Canvas size
width, height = 768, 1152
bg_color = (20, 20, 20)

# Font setup (use default PIL font for simplicity)
font = ImageFont.load_default()

def create_card(title, subtitle, effects, image_color=(40,40,40)):
    """Generate a stylized card frame with title, subtitle, and effects."""
    card = Image.new("RGB", (width, height), bg_color)
    draw = ImageDraw.Draw(card)
    
    # Background block
    draw.rectangle([0,0,width,height], fill=image_color)
    
    # Title
    draw.rectangle([0,0,width,80], fill=(255,100,0))
    draw.text((20,20), title, font=font, fill=(255,255,255))
    
    # Subtitle (wrapped)
    y_text = 100
    for line in textwrap.wrap(subtitle, width=50):
        draw.text((20,y_text), line, font=font, fill=(255,255,255))
        y_text += 20
    
    # Effects at bottom
    draw.rectangle([0,height-120,width,height], fill=(0,0,0))
    y_eff = height-110
    for eff in effects:
        draw.text((20,y_eff), eff, font=font, fill=(0,255,100))
        y_eff += 20
    
    return card

# Define panels
panels = [
    ("Workstation Node üíª", "Urban Runner HQ. Day begins at the hookah lounge.", ["+ Focus üëÄ", "+ Flow üé∂"], (50,50,70)),
    ("Recovery Node üåø", "90 min Thai massage ‚Äì reset my body.", ["+ Recovery üåø", "+ Energy ‚ö°"], (70,40,40)),
    ("Chores Node üõí", "Supplies secured: detergent, razors, coconut water, nuts.", ["+ Clean Gear üßº", "+ Hydration üíß", "+ Snacks ü•ú", "+ Smooth Shave ü™í"], (40,70,40)),
    ("Boost Node üåø", "Boost unlocked ‚Äì Idea: QR codes as portals.", ["+ Creativity üé®", "+ Focus üëÄ", "+ Flow üî•"], (40,60,80)),
    ("Reality Break üé¨", "NPC ‚Üí Player Transition at Cannabis Club.", ["+ Awareness üåç", "+ Community üë•"], (80,60,40)),
    ("Walkthrough Node üö∂", "Walking home on Sukhumvit 11. I see them from a distance‚Ä¶", ["+ Anticipation ‚è≥", "+ Street Sense üï∂Ô∏è"], (60,40,80)),
    ("Side Quest ‚öîÔ∏è", "Bangkok Hustle II: Confrontation.\nYou: 'You‚Äôre good salesmen. Just using your gift wrong.'\nNPC: 'No scam, brother, same price!'\nNPC laughs: 'Hahaha‚Ä¶'", ["+ Boldness üî•", "+ Street Cred üé≠", "+ Awareness üåç"], (80,40,60)),
    ("Balcony Reflection üåå", "From above the city, I reflect on the hustle.", ["+ Perspective üåå", "+ Resolve üõ°Ô∏è"], (30,30,60)),
]

# Generate frames
frames = [create_card(t,s,e,c) for t,s,e,c in panels]

# Save GIF
gif_path = "/mnt/data/episode5_comic_cutscene.gif"
frames[0].save(gif_path, save_all=True, append_images=frames[1:], duration=1200, loop=0)

gif_path

content.text:
from PIL import Image, ImageDraw, ImageFont
import textwrap

# Canvas size
width, height = 768, 1152
bg_color = (20, 20, 20)

# Load a font (default PIL bitmap font cannot render emojis, so strip them out)
font = ImageFont.load_default()

def safe_text(text):
    # Remove emojis/unicode that PIL default font can't render
    return ''.join([c if ord(c) < 128 else '' for c in text])

def create_card(title, subtitle, effects, image_color=(40,40,40)):
    """Generate a stylized card frame with title, subtitle, and effects."""
    card = Image.new("RGB", (width, height), bg_color)
    draw = ImageDraw.Draw(card)
    
    # Background block
    draw.rectangle([0,0,width,height], fill=image_color)
    
    # Title
    draw.rectangle([0,0,width,80], fill=(255,100,0))
    draw.text((20,20), safe_text(title), font=font, fill=(255,255,255))
    
    # Subtitle (wrapped)
    y_text = 100
    for line in textwrap.wrap(safe_text(subtitle), width=50):
        draw.text((20,y_text), line, font=font, fill=(255,255,255))
        y_text += 20
    
    # Effects at bottom
    draw.rectangle([0,height-120,width,height], fill=(0,0,0))
    y_eff = height-110
    for eff in effects:
        draw.text((20,y_eff), safe_text(eff), font=font, fill=(0,255,100))
        y_eff += 20
    
    return card

# Define panels without emojis in text (will still communicate the vibe)
panels = [
    ("Workstation Node", "Urban Runner HQ. Day begins at the hookah lounge.", ["+ Focus", "+ Flow"], (50,50,70)),
    ("Recovery Node", "90 min Thai massage ‚Äì reset my body.", ["+ Recovery", "+ Energy"], (70,40,40)),
    ("Chores Node", "Supplies secured: detergent, razors, coconut water, nuts.", ["+ Clean Gear", "+ Hydration", "+ Snacks", "+ Smooth Shave"], (40,70,40)),
    ("Boost Node", "Boost unlocked ‚Äì Idea: QR codes as portals.", ["+ Creativity", "+ Focus", "+ Flow"], (40,60,80)),
    ("Reality Break", "NPC -> Player Transition at Cannabis Club.", ["+ Awareness", "+ Community"], (80,60,40)),
    ("Walkthrough Node", "Walking home on Sukhumvit 11. I see them from a distance‚Ä¶", ["+ Anticipation", "+ Street Sense"], (60,40,80)),
    ("Side Quest", "Bangkok Hustle II: Confrontation.\nYou: 'You‚Äôre good salesmen. Just using your gift wrong.'\nNPC: 'No scam, brother, same price!'\nNPC laughs: 'Hahaha‚Ä¶'", ["+ Boldness", "+ Street Cred", "+ Awareness"], (80,40,60)),
    ("Balcony Reflection", "From above the city, I reflect on the hustle.", ["+ Perspective", "+ Resolve"], (30,30,60)),
]

# Generate frames
frames = [create_card(t,s,e,c) for t,s,e,c in panels]

# Save GIF
gif_path = "/mnt/data/episode5_comic_cutscene.gif"
frames[0].save(gif_path, save_all=True, append_images=frames[1:], duration=1200, loop=0)

gif_path
'/mnt/data/episode5_comic_cutscene.gif'

from PIL import Image, ImageDraw

# Paths
card_path = "/mnt/data/A_trading_card_titled_\"Bangkok_Hustle_II:_Side_Que.png"
qr_path = "/mnt/data/soi11_confrontation_qr.png"

qr = Image.open(qr_path).convert("RGBA")

# Resize QR smaller for clean integration
qr_size = card.width // 6
qr = qr.resize((qr_size, qr_size))

# Create white background for QR
qr_bg = Image.new("RGBA", (qr_size+10, qr_size+10), (255,255,255,255))
qr_bg.paste(qr, (5,5))

# Define position (bottom-right, replacing old QR zone)
pos = (card.width - qr_bg.width - 40, card.height - qr_bg.height - 40)

draw = ImageDraw.Draw(card)
draw.rectangle([pos[0], pos[1], pos[0]+qr_bg.width, pos[1]+qr_bg.height], fill=(20,20,20,255))

# Paste clean QR onto cleared area
card.paste(qr_bg, pos, qr_bg)

# Save new card
replaced_card_path = "/mnt/data/Bangkok_Hustle_II_SideQuest_QRReplaced.png"
card.save(replaced_card_path)

replaced_card_path

content.text:
from PIL import Image, ImageDraw, ImageFont
import os

# Paths
base_card = "/mnt/data/A_collectible_card_titled_\"Bangkok_Hustle_II:_Side.png"
qr_path = "/mnt/data/soi11_confrontation_qr.png"

card = Image.open(base_card).convert("RGBA")
qr = Image.open(qr_path).convert("RGBA")

# Size + style
qr_size = card.width // 6  # proportional, smaller and clean
qr = qr.resize((qr_size, qr_size))

# Background panel with rounded corners to match card UI
pad = 18
panel_w, panel_h = qr_size + pad*2, qr_size + pad*2
panel = Image.new("RGBA", (panel_w, panel_h), (0,0,0,0))

draw = ImageDraw.Draw(panel)
# Colors approximating the card's gold frame + dark fill
fill_color = (25, 25, 29, 255)
border_color = (212, 177, 118, 255)

# Draw rounded rectangle with border
draw.rounded_rectangle([0,0,panel_w-1,panel_h-1], radius=24, fill=fill_color, outline=border_color, width=6)

# Paste QR centered on panel
panel.paste(qr, (pad, pad))

# Position (bottom-right with margin)
margin = 40
pos = (card.width - panel_w - margin, card.height - panel_h - margin)

# Composite onto card
card.alpha_composite(panel, dest=pos)

# Save final
final_path = "/mnt/data/Bangkok_Hustle_II_SideQuest_QR_CLEAN.png"
card.save(final_path)

final_path

from PIL import Image
import numpy as np, math

img = Image.open("/mnt/data/A_trading_card_titled_\"Bangkok_Hustle_II:_Side_Que.png").convert("L")
w,h = img.size

# Define search area: bottom 45% height, right 45% width
x0 = int(w*0.45)
y0 = int(h*0.55)
roi = img.crop((x0,y0,w,h))

rw, rh = roi.size

best = None
best_score = -1
best_params = None

arr_roi = np.array(roi)

# Pre-threshold for speed
for size in range(180, 360, 4):
    # slide window
    step = 6
    for y in range(0, rh-size, step):
        for x in range(0, rw-size, step):
            patch = arr_roi[y:y+size, x:x+size]
            # Binarize
            bw = (patch < 80) | (patch > 190)
            ratio = bw.mean()
            if ratio < 0.35 or ratio > 0.75: 
                continue
            # transitions along rows
            diffs = np.diff(bw, axis=1)
            transitions = np.mean(np.sum(diffs!=0, axis=1))
            score = transitions
            if score > best_score:
                best_score = score
                best = (x, y, size)
                
best, best_score
'/mnt/data/Bangkok_Hustle_II_SideQuest_QR_CLEAN.png'

base_card_path = "/mnt/data/A_collectible_card_titled_\"Bangkok_Hustle_II:_Side.png"
qr_path = "/mnt/data/soi11_confrontation_qr.png"

card = Image.open(base_card_path).convert("RGBA")
qr = Image.open(qr_path).convert("RGBA")

# Resize QR for integration
qr_size = card.width // 6
qr = qr.resize((qr_size, qr_size))

# Create styled panel for QR (rounded rectangle, matching card frame aesthetics)
pad = 18
panel_w, panel_h = qr_size + pad*2, qr_size + pad*2
panel = Image.new("RGBA", (panel_w, panel_h), (0,0,0,0))

draw = ImageDraw.Draw(panel)
fill_color = (25, 25, 29, 255)  # dark fill
border_color = (212, 177, 118, 255)  # gold frame
draw.rounded_rectangle([0,0,panel_w-1,panel_h-1], radius=24, fill=fill_color, outline=border_color, width=6)

# Paste QR onto panel
panel.paste(qr, (pad, pad))

# Position in bottom-right corner
margin = 40
pos = (card.width - panel_w - margin, card.height - panel_h - margin)
card.alpha_composite(panel, dest=pos)

# Save updated Side Quest card
sidequest_final = "/mnt/data/Bangkok_Hustle_II_SideQuest_QR_FINAL.png"
card.save(sidequest_final)


# --- Boost Card for Cannabis Club ---
boost_card_template = "/mnt/data/fuel-up-template.png"
qr_boost_path = "/mnt/data/soi11_confrontation_qr.png"  # placeholder, real cannabis club QR can be generated separately

boost_card = Image.open(boost_card_template).convert("RGBA")
qr_boost = Image.open(qr_boost_path).convert("RGBA")

# Resize and style QR
qr_boost_size = boost_card.width // 6
qr_boost = qr_boost.resize((qr_boost_size, qr_boost_size))

pad = 18
panel_w, panel_h = qr_boost_size + pad*2, qr_boost_size + pad*2
panel_boost = Image.new("RGBA", (panel_w, panel_h), (0,0,0,0))

draw = ImageDraw.Draw(panel_boost)
draw.rounded_rectangle([0,0,panel_w-1,panel_h-1], radius=24, fill=fill_color, outline=border_color, width=6)

panel_boost.paste(qr_boost, (pad,pad))

# Position bottom-right
pos_boost = (boost_card.width - panel_w - margin, boost_card.height - panel_h - margin)
boost_card.alpha_composite(panel_boost, dest=pos_boost)

# Save Boost card
boost_final = "/mnt/data/Boost_Card_CannabisClub_QR.png"
boost_card.save(boost_final)

(sidequest_final, boost_final)

from PIL import Image, ImageDraw

# Paths to refined card and QR code
card_path = "/mnt/data/A_stylized_digital_illustration_designed_as_a_coll.png"
qr_path = "/mnt/data/soi11_confrontation_qr.png"

# Open images
card = Image.open(card_path).convert("RGBA")
qr = Image.open(qr_path).convert("RGBA")

# Resize QR for integration
qr_size = card.width // 6
qr = qr.resize((qr_size, qr_size))

# Create a clean white background behind QR for scannability
qr_bg = Image.new("RGBA", (qr_size + 12, qr_size + 12), (255, 255, 255, 255))
qr_bg.paste(qr, (6, 6))

# Position QR in bottom-right corner
pos = (card.width - qr_bg.width - 40, card.height - qr_bg.height - 40)

# Clear out any duplicate footer/labels area by overlaying a dark rectangle
draw = ImageDraw.Draw(card)
draw.rectangle([pos[0], pos[1], pos[0] + qr_bg.width, pos[1] + qr_bg.height], fill=(20, 20, 20, 255))

# Paste functional QR code
card.paste(qr_bg, pos, qr_bg)

# Save final cleaned card
final_clean_card_path = "/mnt/data/Bangkok_Hustle_II_SideQuest_QR_FINAL.png"
card.save(final_clean_card_path)

final_clean_card_path

# Save final cleaned card

from PIL import Image, ImageDraw, ImageFont
import qrcode

# Recreate QR code for the location
coords_url = "https://www.google.com/maps?q=13.7422582,100.5564934"
qr = qrcode.QRCode(version=1, box_size=10, border=4)
qr.add_data(coords_url)
qr.make(fit=True)
qr_img = qr.make_image(fill="black", back_color="white").convert("RGBA")

# Load base card (refined edition without edits)
card_path = "/mnt/data/A_stylized_digital_illustration_designed_as_a_coll.png"
card = Image.open(card_path).convert("RGBA")

# Resize QR smaller for integration
qr_size = card.width // 8
qr_resized = qr_img.resize((qr_size, qr_size))

# Dimensions for bottom strip
strip_height = qr_size + 30
strip = Image.new("RGBA", (card.width, strip_height), (20, 20, 20, 230))  # dark transparent strip

# Add gritty/glitch footer text
draw = ImageDraw.Draw(strip)
font = ImageFont.load_default()
footer_text = "+ Boldness üî•   |   + Street Cred üé≠   |   + Awareness üåç"
draw.text((20, strip_height//2 - 7), footer_text, font=font, fill=(0, 255, 100))

# Position QR bottom-right inside strip
pos_qr = (strip.width - qr_resized.width - 20, (strip_height - qr_resized.height)//2)
strip.paste(qr_resized, pos_qr, qr_resized)

# Combine card + strip
combined = Image.new("RGBA", (card.width, card.height + strip_height))
combined.paste(card, (0,0))
combined.paste(strip, (0, card.height))

# Save final card
final_card_path = "/mnt/data/Bangkok_Hustle_II_SideQuest_QR_CleanStrip.png"
combined.save(final_card_path)

final_card_path

from PIL import Image, ImageDraw, ImageFont
import qrcode

# Recreate QR code for the location
coords_url = "https://www.google.com/maps?q=13.7422582,100.5564934"
qr = qrcode.QRCode(version=1, box_size=10, border=4)
qr.add_data(coords_url)
qr.make(fit=True)
qr_img = qr.make_image(fill="black", back_color="white").convert("RGBA")

# Load base card (refined edition without edits)
card_path = "/mnt/data/A_stylized_digital_illustration_designed_as_a_coll.png"
card = Image.open(card_path).convert("RGBA")

# Resize QR smaller for integration
qr_size = card.width // 8
qr_resized = qr_img.resize((qr_size, qr_size))

# Dimensions for bottom strip
strip_height = qr_size + 30
strip = Image.new("RGBA", (card.width, strip_height), (20, 20, 20, 230))  # dark transparent strip

# Add gritty/glitch footer text
draw = ImageDraw.Draw(strip)
font = ImageFont.load_default()
footer_text = "+ Boldness üî•   |   + Street Cred üé≠   |   + Awareness üåç"

# Position QR bottom-right inside strip
pos_qr = (strip.width - qr_resized.width - 20, (strip_height - qr_resized.height)//2)
strip.paste(qr_resized, pos_qr, qr_resized)

# Combine card + strip
combined = Image.new("RGBA", (card.width, card.height + strip_height))
combined.paste(card, (0,0))
combined.paste(strip, (0, card.height))

final_card_path

content.text:
from PIL import Image, ImageDraw, ImageFont
import qrcode

# Recreate QR code for the location
coords_url = "https://www.google.com/maps?q=13.7422582,100.5564934"
qr = qrcode.QRCode(version=1, box_size=10, border=4)
qr.add_data(coords_url)
qr.make(fit=True)
qr_img = qr.make_image(fill="black", back_color="white").convert("RGBA")

# Load base card (refined edition without edits)
card_path = "/mnt/data/A_stylized_digital_illustration_designed_as_a_coll.png"
card = Image.open(card_path).convert("RGBA")

# Resize QR smaller for integration
qr_size = card.width // 8
qr_resized = qr_img.resize((qr_size, qr_size))

# Dimensions for bottom strip
strip_height = qr_size + 30
strip = Image.new("RGBA", (card.width, strip_height), (20, 20, 20, 230))  # dark strip

# Add gritty/glitch footer text (ASCII only, replace emojis with words)
draw = ImageDraw.Draw(strip)
font = ImageFont.load_default()
footer_text = "+ Boldness [FIRE]   |   + Street Cred [MASK]   |   + Awareness [EYE]"
draw.text((20, strip_height//2 - 7), footer_text, font=font, fill=(0, 255, 100))

# Position QR bottom-right inside strip
pos_qr = (strip.width - qr_resized.width - 20, (strip_height - qr_resized.height)//2)
strip.paste(qr_resized, pos_qr, qr_resized)

# Combine card + strip
combined = Image.new("RGBA", (card.width, card.height + strip_height))
combined.paste(card, (0,0))
combined.paste(strip, (0, card.height))

# Save final card
final_card_path = "/mnt/data/Bangkok_Hustle_II_SideQuest_QR_CleanStrip_v2.png"
combined.save(final_card_path)

final_card_path
'/mnt/data/Bangkok_Hustle_II_SideQuest_QR_CleanStrip_v2.png'

from PIL import Image, ImageDraw
import qrcode

# Recreate real QR code for Soi 11 confrontation location
coords_url = "https://www.google.com/maps?q=13.7422582,100.5564934"
qr = qrcode.QRCode(version=1, box_size=10, border=4)
qr.add_data(coords_url)
qr.make(fit=True)
qr_img = qr.make_image(fill="black", back_color="white").convert("RGBA")

# Load original refined card (with fake QR still visible)
card_path = "/mnt/data/A_stylized_digital_illustration_designed_as_a_coll.png"
card = Image.open(card_path).convert("RGBA")

# Resize real QR to match size of fake one (approx. 1/5 of card width)
qr_size = card.width // 5
qr_resized = qr_img.resize((qr_size, qr_size))

# Position to align with the old QR code zone (bottom-right region)
pos = (card.width - qr_size - 55, card.height - qr_size - 65)

# Mask out old QR code with dark rectangle
draw = ImageDraw.Draw(card)
draw.rectangle([pos[0], pos[1], pos[0]+qr_size, pos[1]+qr_size], fill=(20,20,20,255))

# Paste new scannable QR exactly in the same position
card.paste(qr_resized, pos, qr_resized)

# Save final card
final_card_path = "/mnt/data/Bangkok_Hustle_II_SideQuest_QR_Seamless.png"
card.save(final_card_path)

final_card_path

from PIL import Image
import qrcode

# Paths
card_path = "/mnt/data/A_vintage-style_illustrated_side_quest_card_titled.png"

# Generate functional QR code for the Soi 11 location
coords_url = "https://www.google.com/maps?q=13.7422582,100.5564934"
qr = qrcode.QRCode(version=1, box_size=10, border=2)
qr.add_data(coords_url)
qr.make(fit=True)
qr_img = qr.make_image(fill="black", back_color="white").convert("RGBA")

# Open base card
card = Image.open(card_path).convert("RGBA")

from PIL import Image

pos_y = int(card.height * 0.90) - qr_size // 2  # place around 90% height, adjust to center footer

# Paste QR
card_with_qr_centered_manual = card.copy()

6. **Card 6 ‚Äì Skyline Reflection (Closing)**  
   - Balcony night view of Bangkok‚Äôs skyline.  
   - ‚ÄúMission Complete‚Äù vibe.  

---

import qrcode
from PIL import Image

# Generate QR code for Marouch Restaurant Google Maps link
url = "https://maps.app.goo.gl/bgxxjo5GGQ4FrC1p7"
qr = qrcode.QRCode(error_correction=qrcode.constants.ERROR_CORRECT_H)
qr.add_data(url)
qr.make(fit=True)

qr_img = qr.make_image(fill_color="black", back_color="white").convert("RGBA")

# Open the base checkpoint card
card_path = "/mnt/data/A_collectible_card-style_digital_illustration_titl.png"
card = Image.open(card_path).convert("RGBA")

# Resize QR to match the template sizing (same as Side Quest)
qr_size = card.width // 6
qr_resized = qr_img.resize((qr_size, qr_size))

# Position QR code in bottom-right footer (aligned with template placement)
pos_x = card.width - qr_size - 40
pos_y = int(card.height * 0.90) - qr_size // 2 - 70

# Paste QR onto the card
card_with_qr = card.copy()
card_with_qr.paste(qr_resized, (pos_x, pos_y), qr_resized)

# Save the final QR-integrated card
output_path = "/mnt/data/Meta_Checkpoint_Marouch_with_QR.png"
card_with_qr.save(output_path)

output_path
'/mnt/data/Meta_Checkpoint_Marouch_with_QR.png'

import qrcode
from PIL import Image

# Generate QR code
qr_url = "https://maps.app.goo.gl/bgxxjo5GGQ4FrC1p7"
qr = qrcode.QRCode(
    version=1,
    error_correction=qrcode.constants.ERROR_CORRECT_H,
    box_size=10,
    border=1,
)
qr.add_data(qr_url)
qr.make(fit=True)
qr_img = qr.make_image(fill_color="black", back_color="white")

# Open the base card (no QR)
base_card_path = "/mnt/data/A_collectible_achievement_card_with_vintage_comic_.png"
base = Image.open(base_card_path).convert("RGBA")

# Resize QR code to fit the footer neatly
qr_size = 200
qr_img = qr_img.resize((qr_size, qr_size))

# Position QR code in bottom-right footer
x = base.width - qr_size - 50
y = base.height - qr_size - 60
base.paste(qr_img, (x, y))

# Save updated card
output_path = "/mnt/data/Meta_Checkpoint_Marouch_with_QR_Fixed.png"
base.save(output_path)

output_path

import qrcode
from PIL import Image

# Generate QR code for Marouch Restaurant Google Maps link
url = "https://maps.app.goo.gl/bgxxjo5GGQ4FrC1p7"
qr = qrcode.QRCode(error_correction=qrcode.constants.ERROR_CORRECT_H)
qr.add_data(url)
qr.make(fit=True)
qr_img = qr.make_image(fill_color="black", back_color="white").convert("RGBA")

# Open base card (no QR version)
card_path = "/mnt/data/A_collectible_achievement_card_with_vintage_comic_.png"
card = Image.open(card_path).convert("RGBA")

# Resize QR to standard size (same as Bangkok Hustle II template)
qr_size = card.width // 6
qr_resized = qr_img.resize((qr_size, qr_size))

# Placement template: bottom-right, vertically centered in footer
footer_height = 150
footer_top = card.height - footer_height
pos_x = card.width - qr_size - 40
pos_y = footer_top + (footer_height - qr_size) // 2

# Paste QR onto the card
card_with_qr = card.copy()
card_with_qr.paste(qr_resized, (pos_x, pos_y), qr_resized)

# Save final aligned card
output_path = "/mnt/data/Meta_Checkpoint_Marouch_QR_Aligned.png"
card_with_qr.save(output_path)

output_path

import qrcode
from PIL import Image

# Google Maps link for Marouch Hookah Lounge
url = "https://maps.app.goo.gl/bgxxjo5GGQ4FrC1p7"

# Generate QR code
qr = qrcode.QRCode(
    version=2,
    error_correction=qrcode.constants.ERROR_CORRECT_H,
    box_size=10,
    border=1,
)
qr.add_data(url)
qr.make(fit=True)

# Create the QR image
qr_img = qr.make_image(fill_color="black", back_color="white")

# Save QR code as PNG
qr_path = "/mnt/data/marouch_hookah_qr.png"
qr_img.save(qr_path)

qr_path

import qrcode
from PIL import Image

# Load the base card (without QR code)
base_card_path = "/mnt/data/A_collectible_achievement_card_with_vintage_comic_.png"
base_card = Image.open(base_card_path).convert("RGBA")

# Generate the QR code for Marouch Hookah Lounge Google Maps link
qr_url = "https://maps.app.goo.gl/bgxxjo5GGQ4FrC1p7"
qr = qrcode.QRCode(error_correction=qrcode.constants.ERROR_CORRECT_H)
qr.add_data(qr_url)
qr.make(fit=True)

qr_img = qr.make_image(fill_color="black", back_color="white").convert("RGBA")

# Resize QR code to fit nicely in the card footer
qr_size = 250
qr_img = qr_img.resize((qr_size, qr_size))

# Position QR code in bottom right, aligned like Bangkok Hustle II card
x_pos = base_card.width - qr_size - 50
y_pos = base_card.height - qr_size - 100

# Composite the QR code onto the card
combined = base_card.copy()
combined.paste(qr_img, (x_pos, y_pos), qr_img)

# Save final output
output_path = "/mnt/data/marouch_hookah_card_with_qr.png"
combined.save(output_path)

output_path
'/mnt/data/marouch_hookah_card_with_qr.png'

You‚Äôre absolutely right ‚Äî iterating QR placement one step at a time here is slow and clunky ‚ö°. We can fix this with a smoother workflow:  

### Better Approaches
1. **Template Approach (Best for Consistency)**  
   - We define a **standard footer ‚Äúslot‚Äù** (exact x,y coordinates + size).  
   - Every card is exported with that slot blank.  
   - Then we auto-layer the QR code in exactly the same spot for all cards.  
   üëâ This guarantees alignment and consistency without trial-and-error.

2. **Local Image Editing Tools (Fast Manual Control)**  
   - Tools like **Photoshop, Affinity Designer, GIMP, or even Figma/Canva** let you drag the QR visually until it looks perfect.  
   - You‚Äôd generate the base cards (no QR), then place the QR manually.  
   üëâ Faster if you want to eyeball placement rather than calculate pixels.  

3. **Hybrid Workflow**  
   - Use me to **generate all base cards without QR codes**.  
   - I also provide you with **ready-to-use QR codes as PNGs**.  
   - You then drop those QR PNGs into the cards using any image editor you prefer.  
   üëâ This gives you total control and saves back-and-forth here.  

---

For now, I can still move this QR up by **100px** so the Marouch card matches the Side Quest alignment. But if you‚Äôre planning to do a whole deck and future episodes, I‚Äôd recommend **approach 1 (template automation)** or **approach 3 (you place QR manually with provided PNGs)**.  

‚ö° Do you want me to go ahead and **shift this QR up by 100px** to finish Marouch now, and then prepare a **blank-template deck + PNG QR set** for you so you can place them super quickly yourself?

Perfect üôå Approach 1 will save us a ton of time and make the whole Episode 5 deck consistent.  

Here‚Äôs how we‚Äôll set it up:  

---

### üîß Step 1 ‚Äì Define a Template
- Choose **one card as the ‚Äúmaster‚Äù** (Bangkok Hustle II works since you said its QR placement is perfect).  
- Measure the QR size and exact coordinates (x,y) in the footer.  
- Lock those values as the **official QR slot**.  

---

### üîß Step 2 ‚Äì Generate Base Cards
- I‚Äôll generate every Episode 5 card **without a QR code**.  
- Each card will have **blank reserved space** in the footer for the QR slot.

### üîß Step 3 ‚Äì Apply QR Codes Automatically
- For each card, I‚Äôll generate the correct QR PNG (Google Maps links, or blog post in the future).  
- A script will paste the QR into the exact slot coordinates across all cards.

content.text:
import json
import qrcode
from PIL import Image

# ---------- Define the QR slot template (based on Bangkok Hustle II perfect layout) ----------
# Using a ratio-based template so it scales to any card size consistently.
template = {
    "qr_size_ratio": 0.19,     # ~19% of card width (visually close to Hustle II)
    "right_margin_px": 50,     # padding from right edge
    "footer_height_px": 150,   # assumed footer height band
    "vertical_align": "center" # center the QR vertically within the footer band
}

# Save the template for reuse
with open("/mnt/data/episode5_qr_template.json", "w") as f:
    json.dump(template, f, indent=2)

# ---------- Apply the template to the Meta Checkpoint: Marouch card ----------
# Base (no-QR) card path
base_card_path = "/mnt/data/A_collectible_achievement_card_with_vintage_comic_.png"
card = Image.open(base_card_path).convert("RGBA")
w, h = card.size

# Compute QR size and position from template
qr_size = int(w * template["qr_size_ratio"])
right_margin = template["right_margin_px"]
footer_h = template["footer_height_px"]
footer_top = h - footer_h

pos_x = w - qr_size - right_margin
pos_y = footer_top + (footer_h - qr_size) // 2

# Generate the QR code (Marouch link)
url = "https://maps.app.goo.gl/bgxxjo5GGQ4FrC1p7"
qr = qrcode.QRCode(error_correction=qrcode.constants.ERROR_CORRECT_H)
qr.add_data(url)
qr.make(fit=True)
qr_img = qr.make_image(fill_color="black", back_color="white").convert("RGBA")
qr_img = qr_img.resize((qr_size, qr_size))

# Paste QR using the standardized slot
final_card = card.copy()
final_card.paste(qr_img, (pos_x, pos_y), qr_img)

# Save outputs
template_path = "/mnt/data/episode5_qr_template.json"
output_card_path = "/mnt/data/Meta_Checkpoint_Marouch_QR_Templated.png"
final_card.save(output_card_path)

(template_path, output_card_path)

('/mnt/data/episode5_qr_template.json',
 '/mnt/data/Meta_Checkpoint_Marouch_QR_Templated.png')

import qrcode
from PIL import Image

# Base card (no QR baked in)
base_card_path = "/mnt/data/A_collectible_achievement_card_with_vintage_comic_.png"
card = Image.open(base_card_path).convert("RGBA")
w, h = card.size

# Load template parameters
template = {
    "qr_size_ratio": 0.19,
    "right_margin_px": 50,
    "footer_height_px": 150,
    "vertical_align": "center"
}

# Generate the QR code for Marouch Restaurant Google Maps link
url = "https://maps.app.goo.gl/bgxxjo5GGQ4FrC1p7"
qr = qrcode.QRCode(error_correction=qrcode.constants.ERROR_CORRECT_H)
qr.add_data(url)
qr.make(fit=True)
qr_img = qr.make_image(fill_color="black", back_color="white").convert("RGBA")

# Compute QR size and placement from template
qr_size = int(w * template["qr_size_ratio"])
qr_resized = qr_img.resize((qr_size, qr_size))

right_margin = template["right_margin_px"]
footer_h = template["footer_height_px"]
footer_top = h - footer_h

pos_x = w - qr_size - right_margin
pos_y = footer_top + (footer_h - qr_size) // 2

# Version 1: Card with QR
card_with_qr = card.copy()
card_with_qr.paste(qr_resized, (pos_x, pos_y), qr_resized)
with_qr_path = "/mnt/data/Meta_Checkpoint_Marouch_TemplateQR.png"
card_with_qr.save(with_qr_path)

# Version 2: Card without QR (just base)
no_qr_path = "/mnt/data/Meta_Checkpoint_Marouch_TemplateNoQR.png"
card.save(no_qr_path)

(with_qr_path, no_qr_path)

I will generate both the updated image file and a JSON with the coordinates for the QR slot. The border will be drawn with a white, slightly translucent fill. I‚Äôll also add an optional "QR" label near the slot. Once done, I can move on to the next card generation.

content.text:
from PIL import Image, ImageDraw, ImageFont
import json

# Load the QR template (ratios and margins)
template = {
    "qr_size_ratio": 0.19,
    "right_margin_px": 50,
    "footer_height_px": 150,
    "vertical_align": "center"
}

# Open the NO-QR base card
no_qr_path = "/mnt/data/Meta_Checkpoint_Marouch_TemplateNoQR.png"
img = Image.open(no_qr_path).convert("RGBA")
w, h = img.size

# Compute slot size/position
qr_size = int(w * template["qr_size_ratio"])
right_margin = template["right_margin_px"]
footer_h = template["footer_height_px"]
footer_top = h - footer_h
slot_x = w - qr_size - right_margin
slot_y = footer_top + (footer_h - qr_size) // 2
slot_w = qr_size
slot_h = qr_size

# Draw a subtle border placeholder for the slot
draw = ImageDraw.Draw(img)
border_color = (255, 255, 255, 220)  # white-ish
border_width = max(4, w // 256)      # scale border with image width
draw.rectangle(
    [slot_x, slot_y, slot_x + slot_w, slot_y + slot_h],
    outline=border_color,
    width=border_width
)

# Optional: tiny "QR" label inside the slot (top-left)
try:
    font = ImageFont.load_default()
    draw.text((slot_x + 8, slot_y + 6), "QR", font=font, fill=(255,255,255,200))
except:
    pass

# Save the card with the slot guide
slot_img_path = "/mnt/data/Meta_Checkpoint_Marouch_NoQR_withSlot.png"
img.save(slot_img_path)

# Save a JSON with exact coordinates for automation
slot_info = {
    "image_width": w,
    "image_height": h,
    "qr_slot": {
        "x": slot_x,
        "y": slot_y,
        "width": slot_w,
        "height": slot_h
    },
    "template_used": template
}
slot_json_path = "/mnt/data/Meta_Checkpoint_Marouch_qr_slot.json"
with open(slot_json_path, "w") as f:
    json.dump(slot_info, f, indent=2)

(slot_img_path, slot_json_path)

('/mnt/data/Meta_Checkpoint_Marouch_NoQR_withSlot.png',
 '/mnt/data/Meta_Checkpoint_Marouch_qr_slot.json')

import json
import numpy as np
from PIL import Image, ImageDraw, ImageFont

# Load the NO-QR base card we made earlier
no_qr_path = "/mnt/data/Meta_Checkpoint_Marouch_TemplateNoQR.png"
img = Image.open(no_qr_path).convert("RGBA")
w, h = img.size

# --- Detect footer band automatically (bottom dark strip) ---
gray = np.array(img.convert("L"))
# Analyze bottom 35% of the image for a dark band
start_row = int(h * 0.65)
region = gray[start_row:,:]
row_means = region.mean(axis=1)

# Threshold: rows darker than this are considered part of the footer band
threshold = 85
footer_mask = row_means < threshold

# Find the longest consecutive run of "dark" rows near the bottom
# We'll scan from bottom upwards to find where the dark band begins
footer_bottom = h - 1
# index of last row in region
idx = len(row_means) - 1
# walk up until we exit dark region, then find top of that dark run
while idx >= 0 and footer_mask[idx]:
    idx -= 1
footer_top_rel = idx + 1  # first dark row from the top going down
footer_top = start_row + footer_top_rel
footer_height = h - footer_top

# Fallback if detection fails (ensure reasonable footer height)
if footer_height < 80 or footer_height > 280:
    footer_top = h - 170
    footer_height = 170

# --- Define QR slot based on detected footer ---
right_margin = max(40, w // 25)  # scale margin with width
qr_size = int(w * 0.18)          # ~18% of width; adjust as needed
slot_x = w - right_margin - qr_size
slot_y = int(footer_top + (footer_height - qr_size) / 2)

# Draw subtle border rectangle to indicate slot (no QR yet)
draw = ImageDraw.Draw(img)
border_color = (255, 255, 255, 230)
border_width = max(4, w // 256)
draw.rectangle([slot_x, slot_y, slot_x + qr_size, slot_y + qr_size],
               outline=border_color, width=border_width)

# Optional label
try:
    font = ImageFont.load_default()
    draw.text((slot_x + 8, slot_y + 6), "QR", font=font, fill=(255,255,255,200))
except:
    pass

# Save updated card and coordinates
slot_img_path = "/mnt/data/Meta_Checkpoint_Marouch_NoQR_withSlot_v2.png"
img.save(slot_img_path)

slot_info = {
    "image_width": w,
    "image_height": h,
    "footer_top": int(footer_top),
    "footer_height": int(footer_height),
    "qr_slot": {
        "x": int(slot_x),
        "y": int(slot_y),
        "width": int(qr_size),
        "height": int(qr_size)
    },
    "notes": "Footer auto-detected from dark band; slot centered vertically in footer, right-aligned with margin."
}
slot_json_path = "/mnt/data/Meta_Checkpoint_Marouch_qr_slot_v2.json"
with open(slot_json_path, "w") as f:
    json.dump(slot_info, f, indent=2)

(slot_img_path, slot_json_path)

 '/mnt/data/Meta_Checkpoint_Marouch_qr_slot_v2.json')

# Let's load the clean card image and programmatically place a QR code centered
# in the bottom footer panel by detecting the dark footer region.
from PIL import Image, ImageDraw, ImageFilter
import numpy as np
import qrcode, os, io, base64, textwrap

base_path = "/mnt/data/checkpoint_marouch_card_clean_1024x1536.png"

img = Image.open(base_path).convert("RGB")
w, h = img.size

# Convert to grayscale and threshold to find dark regions (footer)
gray = np.array(img.convert("L"))
# Work only on bottom 45% of the image to focus on footer
crop_top = int(h * 0.55)
bottom_part = gray[crop_top: , :]

# Threshold
mask = bottom_part < 45  # very dark regions
# Morphological closing via dilation + erosion to merge texts/padding
from scipy.ndimage import binary_dilation, binary_erosion
mask_dil = binary_dilation(mask, iterations=4)
mask_cl = binary_erosion(mask_dil, iterations=3)

# Find the largest connected component bounding box
from scipy.ndimage import label, find_objects
lbl, n = label(mask_cl)
slices = find_objects(lbl)

# Choose the largest area slice
best_slice = None
best_area = 0
for slc in slices:
    if slc is None: 
        continue
    sy, sx = slc
    area = (sy.stop - sy.start) * (sx.stop - sx.start)
    if area > best_area:
        best_area = area
        best_slice = slc

# Compute footer bbox in full-image coordinates
if best_slice:
    sy, sx = best_slice
    y1 = crop_top + sy.start
    y2 = crop_top + sy.stop
    x1 = sx.start
    x2 = sx.stop
    footer_bbox = (x1, y1, x2, y2)
else:
    footer_bbox = (int(w*0.04), int(h*0.78), int(w*0.96), int(h*0.96))

footer_bbox

import qrcode
from PIL import Image

# Step 1: Generate the QR code for the provided Google Maps link
qr_url = "https://maps.app.goo.gl/bgxxjo5GGQ4FrC1p7"
qr = qrcode.QRCode(
    version=2,
    error_correction=qrcode.constants.ERROR_CORRECT_H,
    box_size=10,
    border=1,
)
qr.add_data(qr_url)
qr.make(fit=True)

qr_img = qr.make_image(fill_color="black", back_color="white").convert("RGBA")

# Step 2: Open the card template with the QR frame
card_path = "/mnt/data/A_digital_illustration_on_a_collectible_card_title.png"
card_img = Image.open(card_path).convert("RGBA")

# Step 3: Resize QR code to fit neatly into the frame area
qr_size = 230
qr_img_resized = qr_img.resize((qr_size, qr_size))

# Step 4: Paste QR code at the correct coordinates (where the frame is aligned)
# Adjust manually based on frame position
position = (card_img.width - qr_size - 60, card_img.height - qr_size - 55)

card_with_qr = card_img.copy()
card_with_qr.paste(qr_img_resized, position, qr_img_resized)

# Step 5: Save output
output_path = "/mnt/data/checkpoint_marouch_with_qr.png"
card_with_qr.save(output_path)

output_path

from PIL import Image, ImageStat, ImageOps, ImageDraw
import numpy as np, os

base_path = '/mnt/data/A_collectible_achievement_card_with_vintage_comic_.png'
im = Image.open(base_path).convert('RGB')
w, h = im.size

# detect footer top by scanning rows from bottom upward for when the brightness increases markedly
arr = np.array(im)
# compute luminance per row
lum = (0.2126*arr[:,:,0] + 0.7152*arr[:,:,1] + 0.0722*arr[:,:,2]).mean(axis=1)

# heuristic: footer is the darkest continuous block in the last 30% of image height
bottom_limit = h
start_search = int(h*0.6)
min_row = start_search
threshold_dark = np.percentile(lum[start_search:], 30)  # dark threshold
# find first row from bottom where row is consistently darker than threshold across majority columns
footer_top = None
for y in range(h-1, start_search, -1):
    if lum[y] > threshold_dark + 5:
        # continues above this is lighter, break when we exit dark region
        continue
    # we entered dark region; find its top by scanning up until rows get lighter
    y2 = y
    while y2>start_search and lum[y2] <= threshold_dark + 5:
        y2 -= 1
    footer_top = y2+1
    break

footer_top, threshold_dark

from PIL import Image, ImageDraw
import qrcode

def place_qr_on_card(base_path, out_path, url, margin_right=28, pad=4):
    im = Image.open(base_path).convert('RGB')
    arr = np.array(im)
    h, w = arr.shape[0], arr.shape[1]
    right = arr[:, int(w*0.55):, :]
    lum_right = (0.2126*right[:,:,0] + 0.7152*right[:,:,1] + 0.0722*right[:,:,2]).mean(axis=1)
    threshold = np.percentile(lum_right[int(h*0.4):], 35)
    # find footer top (dark region from bottom)
    y = h-2
    while y>int(h*0.4) and lum_right[y] >= threshold:
        y -= 1
    # now y is within footer dark region; find its upper boundary
    y2 = y
    while y2>int(h*0.4) and lum_right[y2] < threshold:
        y2 -= 1
    footer_top = y2+1
    footer_bottom = h - 18  # just above bottom border
    footer_top_in = footer_top + 10
    footer_bottom_in = footer_bottom - 10
    footer_h = footer_bottom_in - footer_top_in
    center_y = (footer_top_in + footer_bottom_in)//2
    
    # size QR to fit 80% of footer height
    qr_size = int(footer_h * 0.8)
    if qr_size < 64: 
        qr_size = 64  # minimum for scannability
    if qr_size > 220:
        qr_size = 220
    
    # build QR
    qr = qrcode.QRCode(error_correction=qrcode.constants.ERROR_CORRECT_M, border=1, box_size=4)
    qr.add_data(url)
    qr.make(fit=True)
    qr_img = qr.make_image(fill_color="black", back_color="white").convert('RGB')
    qr_img = qr_img.resize((qr_size, qr_size), Image.NEAREST)
    
    # compute position bottom-right inside panel
    x = w - margin_right - qr_size
    y = int(center_y - qr_size/2)
    im.paste(qr_img, (x, y))
    
    # Save
    im.save(out_path, quality=95)
    return out_path, (x,y,qr_size,qr_size), (footer_top, footer_bottom, center_y, footer_h)

url = "https://maps.app.goo.gl/bgxxjo5GGQ4FrC1p7"
out_path = '/mnt/data/checkpoint_marouch_qr_v2.png'
place_qr_on_card('/mnt/data/A_collectible_achievement_card_with_vintage_comic_.png', out_path, url)

    # size QR to fit 80% of footer height
    qr_size = int(footer_h * 0.8)
    if qr_size < 64: 
        qr_size = 64  # minimum for scannability
    if qr_size > 220:
        qr_size = 220
    
    # build QR
    qr = qrcode.QRCode(error_correction=qrcode.constants.ERROR_CORRECT_M, border=1, box_size=4)
    qr.add_data(url)
    qr.make(fit=True)
    qr_img = qr.make_image(fill_color="black", back_color="white").convert('RGB')
    qr_img = qr_img.resize((qr_size, qr_size), Image.NEAREST)
    
    # compute position bottom-right inside panel
    x = w - margin_right - qr_size
    y = int(center_y - qr_size/2)
    im.paste(qr_img, (x, y))
    
    # Save
    im.save(out_path, quality=95)
    return out_path, (x,y,qr_size,qr_size), (footer_top, footer_bottom, center_y, footer_h)

out_path = '/mnt/data/checkpoint_marouch_qr_v2.png'
place_qr_on_card('/mnt/data/A_collectible_achievement_card_with_vintage_comic_.png', out_path, url)

import numpy as np
from PIL import Image, ImageDraw

def detect_footer_top_via_jump(im):
    arr = np.array(im)
    h, w = arr.shape[:2]
    right = arr[:, int(w*0.55):, :]
    lum = (0.2126*right[:,:,0] + 0.7152*right[:,:,1] + 0.0722*right[:,:,2]).mean(axis=1)
    # compute gradient from bottom up
    y0 = int(h*0.5)
    grad = lum[y0+1:] - lum[y0:-1]
    # consider last 40% region
    idx_start = int(h*0.65) - y0 - 1
    idx_end = len(grad)
    seg = grad[idx_start:]
    # find largest positive jump
    j = np.argmax(seg)
    y_at_jump = y0+1 + idx_start + j
    return y_at_jump

from PIL import Image, ImageDraw
import numpy as np, qrcode

def footer_center_from_lines(path):
    im = Image.open(path).convert('RGB')
    arr = np.array(im)
    h, w = arr.shape[:2]
    # compute luminance on central band
    band = arr[:, int(w*0.1):int(w*0.9), :]
    lum = (0.2126*band[:,:,0] + 0.7152*band[:,:,1] + 0.0722*band[:,:,2]).mean(axis=1)
    # bottom beige border (bright row near bottom)
    y = h-2
    border_y = None
    while y>0:
        if lum[y] > 160:
            border_y = y
            break
        y -= 1
    # find top of footer: search upward for long bright jump after dark run
    y = border_y - 5
    dark_run = 0
    top_line = None
    while y>0:
        if lum[y] < 60:
            dark_run += 1
        else:
            if dark_run > 100 and lum[y] > 100:
                top_line = y
                break
            dark_run = 0
        y -= 1
    footer_top_in = top_line + 8  # inside the gold line
    footer_bottom_in = border_y - 8
    center_y = (footer_top_in + footer_bottom_in)//2
    return int(center_y), int(footer_top_in), int(footer_bottom_in), int(border_y), int(top_line)

center_y, top_in, bot_in, border_y, top_line = footer_center_from_lines('/mnt/data/A_collectible_achievement_card_with_vintage_comic_.png')
center_y, top_in, bot_in

from PIL import Image, ImageDraw
import numpy as np, qrcode

def footer_center_from_lines(path):
    im = Image.open(path).convert('RGB')
    arr = np.array(im)
    h, w = arr.shape[:2]
    # compute luminance on central band
    band = arr[:, int(w*0.1):int(w*0.9), :]
    lum = (0.2126*band[:,:,0] + 0.7152*band[:,:,1] + 0.0722*band[:,:,2]).mean(axis=1)
    # bottom beige border (bright row near bottom)
    y = h-2
    border_y = None
    while y>0:
        if lum[y] > 160:
            border_y = y
            break
        y -= 1
    # find top of footer: search upward for long bright jump after dark run
    y = border_y - 5
    dark_run = 0
    top_line = None
    while y>0:
        if lum[y] < 60:
            dark_run += 1
        else:
            if dark_run > 100 and lum[y] > 100:
                top_line = y
                break
            dark_run = 0
        y -= 1
    footer_top_in = top_line + 8  # inside the gold line
    footer_bottom_in = border_y - 8
    center_y = (footer_top_in + footer_bottom_in)//2
    return int(center_y), int(footer_top_in), int(footer_bottom_in), int(border_y), int(top_line)

def overlay_qr_centered(base_path, out_path, url, margin_right=36):
    im = Image.open(base_path).convert('RGB')
    w, h = im.size
    center_y, top_in, bot_in, border_y, top_line = footer_center_from_lines(base_path)
    footer_h = bot_in - top_in
    qr_size = int(footer_h * 0.8)  # 80% of footer height
    if qr_size % 2 == 1:
        qr_size -= 1
    
    # generate QR
    qr = qrcode.QRCode(error_correction=qrcode.constants.ERROR_CORRECT_M, border=1, box_size=8)
    qr.add_data(url)
    qr.make(fit=True)
    qr_img = qr.make_image(fill_color="black", back_color="white").convert('RGB')
    qr_img = qr_img.resize((qr_size, qr_size), Image.NEAREST)
    
    x = w - margin_right - qr_size
    y = int(center_y - qr_size/2)
    im.paste(qr_img, (x, y))
    
    # Also draw a faint placeholder frame (for verification)
    draw = ImageDraw.Draw(im)
    # draw rectangle of target area
    draw.rectangle([ (x, top_in), (x+qr_size, bot_in) ], outline=(255,255,255,128), width=1)
    
    im.save(out_path, quality=95)
    return out_path, (x,y,qr_size)

out_path = '/mnt/data/checkpoint_marouch_qr_v3.png'
overlay_qr_centered('/mnt/data/A_collectible_achievement_card_with_vintage_comic_.png', out_path, "https://maps.app.goo.gl/bgxxjo5GGQ4FrC1p7")

def overlay_qr_with_margin(base_path, out_path, url, margin=20):
    im = Image.open(base_path).convert('RGB')
    w, h = im.size
    center_y, top_in, bot_in, border_y, top_line = footer_center_from_lines(base_path)
    footer_h = bot_in - top_in
    qr_size = int(footer_h * 0.75)  # slightly smaller to fit margins
    if qr_size % 2 == 1:
        qr_size -= 1
    
    # generate QR
    qr = qrcode.QRCode(error_correction=qrcode.constants.ERROR_CORRECT_M, border=1, box_size=8)
    qr.add_data(url)
    qr.make(fit=True)
    qr_img = qr.make_image(fill_color="black", back_color="white").convert('RGB')
    qr_img = qr_img.resize((qr_size, qr_size), Image.NEAREST)
    
    # compute position with 20px margin from right and bottom edges of footer
    x = w - margin - qr_size
    # bottom bound of footer, minus margin
    footer_bottom_margin = bot_in - margin
    y = footer_bottom_margin - qr_size
    
    im.paste(qr_img, (x, y))
    im.save(out_path, quality=95)
    return out_path, (x,y,qr_size)

out_margin = '/mnt/data/checkpoint_marouch_qr_margin20.png'
overlay_qr_with_margin('/mnt/data/A_collectible_achievement_card_with_vintage_comic_.png', out_margin, "https://maps.app.goo.gl/bgxxjo5GGQ4FrC1p7")

import qrcode
from PIL import Image, ImageDraw
import numpy as np

# Redefine footer detection helper
def footer_center_from_lines(path):
    im = Image.open(path).convert('RGB')
    arr = np.array(im)
    h, w = arr.shape[:2]
    band = arr[:, int(w*0.1):int(w*0.9), :]
    lum = (0.2126*band[:,:,0] + 0.7152*band[:,:,1] + 0.0722*band[:,:,2]).mean(axis=1)
    y = h-2
    border_y = None
    while y>0:
        if lum[y] > 160:
            border_y = y
            break
        y -= 1
    y = border_y - 5
    dark_run = 0
    top_line = None
    while y>0:
        if lum[y] < 60:
            dark_run += 1
        else:
            if dark_run > 100 and lum[y] > 100:
                top_line = y
                break
            dark_run = 0
        y -= 1
    footer_top_in = top_line + 8
    footer_bottom_in = border_y - 8
    center_y = (footer_top_in + footer_bottom_in)//2
    return int(center_y), int(footer_top_in), int(footer_bottom_in), int(border_y), int(top_line)

# Define overlay with margin
def overlay_qr_with_margin(base_path, out_path, url, margin=20):
    im = Image.open(base_path).convert('RGB')
    w, h = im.size
    center_y, top_in, bot_in, border_y, top_line = footer_center_from_lines(base_path)
    footer_h = bot_in - top_in
    qr_size = int(footer_h * 0.75)
    if qr_size % 2 == 1:
        qr_size -= 1
    qr = qrcode.QRCode(error_correction=qrcode.constants.ERROR_CORRECT_M, border=1, box_size=8)
    qr.add_data(url)
    qr.make(fit=True)
    qr_img = qr.make_image(fill_color="black", back_color="white").convert('RGB')
    qr_img = qr_img.resize((qr_size, qr_size), Image.NEAREST)
    x = w - margin - qr_size
    footer_bottom_margin = bot_in - margin
    y = footer_bottom_margin - qr_size
    im.paste(qr_img, (x, y))
    im.save(out_path, quality=95)
    return out_path, (x,y,qr_size)

{"prompt":"Urban Runner checkpoint card in gritty vintage comic style. Title: "Checkpoint ‚Äì Foodland Supermarket". Category tag: "Food & Groceries". Visual: supermarket aisle inspired by provided photos; highlight blue Attack detergent bag, Malee coconut water, Tong Garden nuts, and Gillette Fusion razors in a basket. Footer contains a taped-on grayscale receipt integrated into the card (no QR drawn). Receipt text (clean, readable, monospaced look):

FOODLAND RECEIPT
Attack Lady Detergent  ‡∏ø194  (~$4.85)
Malee Coconut Water    ‡∏ø69   (~$1.73)
Tong Garden Nuts       ‡∏ø125  (~$3.13)
Gillette Fusion Razors ‡∏ø599  (~$14.98)
-------------------------------------
TOTAL                  ‡∏ø987  (~$24.68)

Effects strip: "+ Supplies üõçÔ∏è | + Value üí≤". Leave clear empty space in the bottom-right footer for a QR to be placed later (do not draw a QR).","size":"1024x1024","n":1}

# Generate a QR code for Foodland Supermarket and overlay it on the latest "Checkpoint" card
from PIL import Image, ImageDraw
import qrcode

# paths
base_path = "/mnt/data/A_stylized_digital_illustration_on_a_checkpoint-st.png"
out_path  = "/mnt/data/checkpoint_foodland_qr.png"

# generate QR
qr_url = "https://maps.app.goo.gl/wCXH8wTqZv9kDvSv6"
qr = qrcode.QRCode(box_size=10, border=1)
qr.add_data(qr_url)
qr.make(fit=True)
qr_img = qr.make_image(fill_color="black", back_color="white").convert("RGBA")

# load base
base = Image.open(base_path).convert("RGBA")
W, H = base.size  # expect 1024x1536

# target box (aligned to the same spec as the Hookah + Side Quest cards)
# 20px from right/bottom edges *of the footer area* and nudged 30px up/left overall
# We'll estimate footer height ~270px based on the template proportions.
footer_height = 270
footer_top = H - footer_height

# qr size
qr_size = 210  # square size
qr_img = qr_img.resize((qr_size, qr_size), resample=Image.LANCZOS)

# placement
x = W - 20 - qr_size - 30   # left
y = footer_top + (footer_height - qr_size)//2 - 30  # vertical center of footer, then nudge up 30

# paste
base.alpha_composite(qr_img, (x, y))

# export
base.save(out_path)

out_path

content.text:
from PIL import Image, ImageDraw
import qrcode, os

base_path = "/mnt/data/A_stylized_digital_illustration_on_a_checkpoint-st.png"
assert os.path.exists(base_path), base_path

# generate QR
qr_url = "https://maps.app.goo.gl/wCXH8wTqZv9kDvSv6"
qr = qrcode.QRCode(box_size=10, border=1)
qr.add_data(qr_url)
qr.make(fit=True)
qr_img = qr.make_image(fill_color="black", back_color="white").convert("RGBA")

# load base
base = Image.open(base_path).convert("RGBA")
W, H = base.size

# footer metrics
footer_height = int(H * 0.175)  # ~268 on 1536
footer_top = H - footer_height

# qr size and placement
qr_size = 210
qr_img = qr_img.resize((qr_size, qr_size))

margin = 20
nudge_up = 30
nudge_left = 30

x = W - margin - qr_size - nudge_left
y = footer_top + (footer_height - qr_size)//2 - nudge_up

base.alpha_composite(qr_img, (x, y))

out_path = "/mnt/data/checkpoint_foodland_qr.png"
base.save(out_path)

out_path

generate a QR code for the Bangkok Hustle 2 that links to Soi 11 https://maps.app.goo.gl/Syyue1hd3g5bo3DY8

content.text:
import qrcode
from PIL import Image

# Google Maps link for Bangkok Hustle II Soi 11
url = "https://maps.app.goo.gl/Syyue1hd3g5bo3DY8"

# Generate QR code
qr = qrcode.QRCode(
    version=2,
    error_correction=qrcode.constants.ERROR_CORRECT_H,
    box_size=10,
    border=2,
)
qr.add_data(url)
qr.make(fit=True)

qr_img = qr.make_image(fill_color="black", back_color="white").convert("RGB")

# Save QR code image
output_path = "/mnt/data/bangkok_hustle_2_soi11_qr.png"
qr_img.save(output_path)

output_path

content.text:
import zipfile
import json
from pathlib import Path

# Define paths
zip_path = Path("/mnt/data/episode5_export_no_assets.zip")
story_path = Path("/mnt/data/episode5_story.md")
json_path = Path("/mnt/data/episode5_export.json")

# Markdown Story Recap
story_md = """# Urban Runner ‚Äì Episode 5: Bangkok Hustle II

## Introduction
Episode 5 of Urban Runner took place in Bangkok and unfolded as a mix of checkpoints, a boost, and a major side quest confrontation.

---

## Checkpoint 1 ‚Äì Marouch Hookah Lounge
- Activity: Meta checkpoint (working on Urban Runner while inside Urban Runner).
- Location: Marouch Restaurant, Sukhumvit Soi 4, Bangkok.
- Action: Worked on the Urban Runner project while relaxing with hookah.
- Buffs: +Focus üëÄ | +Meta Awareness üåÄ
- QR: Google Maps link to Marouch.

---

## Checkpoint 2 ‚Äì Foodland Supermarket
- Activity: Grocery run.
- Location: Foodland, Sukhumvit 5, Bangkok.
- Purchases:
  - Attack Lady Elegance Detergent ‚Äì ‡∏ø194 / $5.55
  - Malee Coconut Water ‚Äì ‡∏ø69 / $1.97
  - Tong Garden Nuts ‚Äì ‡∏ø125 / $3.55
  - Gillette Fusion Razors ‚Äì ‡∏ø599 / $17.10
- Total: ‡∏ø867 / $24.77
- Buffs: +Supplies üõçÔ∏è | +Value üí≤
- QR: Google Maps link to Foodland.

---

## Checkpoint 3 ‚Äì Cannabis Club Boost
- Activity: Bong session and QR code demo.
- Location: Thai Cannabis Club, Sukhumvit area, Bangkok.
- Action: Bong session (‡∏ø50) + Tip (‡∏ø40). Demonstrated scannable QR cards to staff who were surprised by the feature.
- Buffs: +Creativity üé® | +Street Cred üé≠
- QR: Google Maps link to Thai Cannabis Club.

---

## Side Quest ‚Äì Bangkok Hustle II: Sukhumvit 11 Confrontation
- Location: Sukhumvit Soi 11, outside Old German Beerhouse.
- Action: Confronted the same Indian brothers from Episode 4‚Äôs scam incident. Called them out directly for the overpriced herbal shop scam. They denied, laughed, but the scam was acknowledged.
- Buffs: +Boldness üî• | +Awareness üåç | +Street Cred üé≠
- QR: Google Maps pin to Soi 11 confrontation spot.

---

## Final Panel ‚Äì Skyline Reflection
- Location: Balcony, Sukhumvit 11 apartment.
- Visual: Night skyline of Bangkok.
- Closing caption: Mission Complete ‚Äì Bangkok Hustle II.
- QR: Link to Episode 5 recap blog (placeholder).

---

## Mission Summary
- Distance: ~12 km walked
- Duration: Full day (~10 hours)
- Cash Spent: ‡∏ø867 groceries + ‡∏ø90 cannabis + misc. tips/donations
- Redistribution: Included tips at Foodland, Cannabis Club, and direct acts from earlier episodes
- Checkpoints: 4
- Boosts: 1
- Side Quests: 1 major (scam confrontation)

**Mission Complete ‚Äì Episode 5: Bangkok Hustle II**
"""

# JSON Export
episode5_json = {
    "episode": 5,
    "title": "Bangkok Hustle II",
    "duration": "Full day (~10 hours)",
    "distance_km": 12,
    "checkpoints": [
        {
            "name": "Marouch Hookah Lounge",
            "type": "checkpoint",
            "location": "Marouch Restaurant, Sukhumvit Soi 4, Bangkok",
            "spend": 0,
            "currency": "THB",
            "buffs": ["+Focus", "+Meta Awareness"],
            "qr_link": "https://maps.app.goo.gl/bgxxjo5GGQ4FrC1p7"
        },
        {
            "name": "Foodland Supermarket",
            "type": "checkpoint",
            "location": "Foodland, Sukhumvit 5, Bangkok",
            "spend": 867,
            "currency": "THB",
            "items": [
                {"name": "Attack Lady Elegance Detergent", "price_thb": 194, "price_usd": 5.55},
                {"name": "Malee Coconut Water", "price_thb": 69, "price_usd": 1.97},
                {"name": "Tong Garden Nuts", "price_thb": 125, "price_usd": 3.55},
                {"name": "Gillette Fusion Razors", "price_thb": 599, "price_usd": 17.10}
            ],
            "buffs": ["+Supplies", "+Value"],
            "qr_link": "https://maps.app.goo.gl/wCXH8wTqZv9kDvSv6"
        },
        {
            "name": "Cannabis Club Boost",
            "type": "boost",
            "location": "Thai Cannabis Club, Sukhumvit, Bangkok",
            "spend": 90,
            "currency": "THB",
            "buffs": ["+Creativity", "+Street Cred"],
            "qr_link": "https://maps.app.goo.gl/PR3BuTBaG8phgrP86"
        },
        {
            "name": "Bangkok Hustle II Confrontation",
            "type": "side quest",
            "location": "Sukhumvit Soi 11, Old German Beerhouse",
            "spend": 0,
            "currency": "THB",
            "buffs": ["+Boldness", "+Awareness", "+Street Cred"],
            "qr_link": "https://maps.app.goo.gl/Syyue1hd3g5bo3DY8"
        }
    ],
    "finale": {
        "name": "Skyline Reflection",
        "location": "Balcony, Sukhumvit 11 apartment, Bangkok",
        "qr_link": "https://paulvisciano.github.io/moments/episode5"
    },
    "mission_summary": {
        "distance_km": 12,
        "duration": "10 hours",
        "cash_spent_thb": 957,
        "cash_spent_usd": 27.32,
        "checkpoints": 4,
        "boosts": 1,
        "side_quests": 1
    }
}

# Write files
story_path.write_text(story_md, encoding="utf-8")
json_path.write_text(json.dumps(episode5_json, indent=2), encoding="utf-8")

# Create zip
with zipfile.ZipFile(zip_path, 'w') as zf:
    zf.write(story_path, arcname=story_path.name)
    zf.write(json_path, arcname=json_path.name)

zip_path
PosixPath('/mnt/data/episode5_export_no_assets.zip')

# Create a canonical Episode 5 export (no image assets) based on user's Google Maps timeline.
import json, zipfile, os, textwrap, datetime, pathlib

base_dir = "/mnt/data/episode5_export_canonical"
os.makedirs(base_dir, exist_ok=True)

# Canonical timeline data from the user's screenshot / messages
episode = {
    "episode": 5,
    "title": "Bangkok Hustle II ‚Äî Side Quest Day",
    "date_local": "2025-09-01",
    "timezone": "Asia/Bangkok",
    "summary": "Work session at Marouch Hookah Lounge, supermarket run, Cannabis Club boost on Soi 7, and calling out the Soi 11 scam‚Äîwrapped with a clean walk back to HYDE.",
    "segments": [
        {
            "type": "walk",
            "from": "HYDE Sukhumvit 11",
            "to": "Marouch Restaurant (Hookah Lounge)",
            "distance_mi": 0.1,
            "duration_min": 18,
            "start_local": "13:28",
            "end_local": "13:46",
            "map_hint": "Sukhumvit Soi 11 block"
        },
        {
            "type": "checkpoint",
            "name": "Marouch Hookah Lounge ‚Äî Meta Checkpoint",
            "location": "5, 2 Soi Sukhumvit 4 Alley, Khlong Toei Nuea, Bangkok 10110",
            "start_local": "13:46",
            "end_local": "20:20",
            "tags": ["work", "episode-5", "meta"],
            "qr_link": "https://maps.app.goo.gl/bgxxjo5GGQ4FrC1p7",
            "notes": [
                "Worked most of the day here on Urban Runner Episode 5.",
                "Decided QR codes should link scenes to real-world locations.",
                "Good Wi‚ÄëFi, comfy seating; felt like a home base."
            ]
        },
        {
            "type": "walk",
            "from": "Marouch Hookah Lounge",
            "to": "Thai Cannabis Club ‚Äî Soi 7",
            "distance_mi": 0.1,
            "duration_min": 4,
            "start_local": "20:20",
            "end_local": "20:24"
        },
        {
            "type": "boost",
            "name": "Thai Cannabis Club ‚Äî Soi 7",
            "start_local": "20:24",
            "end_local": "20:50",
            "qr_link": "https://maps.app.goo.gl/WsymNkcFjsLa2V7t6",
            "notes": [
                "Tested the first live QR; staff scanned it and it opened Google Maps.",
                "50 THB bong use; tipped 40 THB; used flower from previous day.",
                "Energy boost led to the Soi 11 ‚ÄòSide Quest‚Äô idea."
            ]
        },
        {
            "type": "walk",
            "from": "Thai Cannabis Club ‚Äî Soi 7",
            "to": "HYDE Sukhumvit 11",
            "distance_mi": 0.4,
            "duration_min": 15,
            "start_local": "20:50",
            "end_local": "21:04"
        },
        {
            "type": "encounter",
            "name": "Soi 11 Scam Call‚Äëout",
            "location": "Old German Beerhouse on 11 ‚Äî frontage",
            "coords": [13.7422582, 100.5564934],
            "dialogue": [
                {"you": "You're actually great salesmen ‚Äî just use that gift in a different way."},
                {"them": "It's not a scam!"},
                {"you": "I have the footage and did the research. Pricing is bogus."}
            ],
            "qr_link": "https://maps.app.goo.gl/Syyue1hd3g5bo3DY8",
            "notes": [
                "Prepared the lines in my head while walking home.",
                "Kept it calm; called it out to their faces; no hard feelings."
            ]
        },
        {
            "type": "home",
            "name": "HYDE Sukhumvit 11 ‚Äî Skyline",
            "notes": [
                "Reflected from the balcony; city lights, meta narrative locked in."
            ]
        }
    ],
    "links": {
        "soi11_map": "https://maps.app.goo.gl/Syyue1hd3g5bo3DY8",
        "cannabis_club": "https://maps.app.goo.gl/WsymNkcFjsLa2V7t6",
        "marouch": "https://maps.app.goo.gl/bgxxjo5GGQ4FrC1p7",
        "foodland": "https://maps.app.goo.gl/wCXH8wTqZv9kDvSv6"
    }
}

# Write JSON
json_path = os.path.join(base_dir, "episode5.json")
with open(json_path, "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
    json.dump(episode, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)

# Build Markdown story
md = f"""# Urban Runner ‚Äî Episode 5 (Canonical)

**Date:** {episode['date_local']} ({episode['timezone']})
**Title:** {episode['title']}

---

## Timeline (from Google Maps)
- 13:28 ‚Üí 13:46 ‚Äî Walk 0.1 mi from HYDE Sukhumvit 11 ‚Üí Marouch Hookah Lounge.
- 13:46 ‚Üí 20:20 ‚Äî Work session at Marouch (Meta Checkpoint).
- 20:20 ‚Üí 20:24 ‚Äî Walk 0.1 mi to Thai Cannabis Club ‚Äî Soi 7.
- 20:24 ‚Üí 20:50 ‚Äî Boost at Thai Cannabis Club.
- 20:50 ‚Üí 21:04 ‚Äî Walk 0.4 mi back toward HYDE.
- ~21:00 ‚Äî **Side‚Äëquest encounter** in front of Old German Beerhouse (Soi 11) ‚Äî scam call‚Äëout.
- Night ‚Äî Balcony reflection, skyline.

## Checkpoints
### Meta Checkpoint: Marouch Hookah Lounge
Worked most of the day and prototyped **QR-powered cards** that deep-link to real locations.
- Map: {episode['links']['marouch']}

### Boost: Thai Cannabis Club ‚Äî Soi 7
Live test of the QR in the wild. Staff scanned it; **it worked**.
- Map: {episode['links']['cannabis_club']}

### Side Quest: Soi 11 Scam Call‚Äëout
‚ÄúYou‚Äôre actually great salesmen ‚Äî just use that gift in a different way.‚Äù ‚Üí ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs not a scam!‚Äù ‚Üí receipts shown.
- Map: {episode['links']['soi11_map']}
- Pin (front of Old German Beerhouse): 13.7422582, 100.5564934

### Home Base: HYDE Sukhumvit 11
Skyline reset and wrap.

## Data
```json
{json.dumps(episode['segments'], ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)}
```

## Notes
- Canonical distances and times pulled from Google Maps timeline screenshot shared by user.
- No image assets included in this export; ready to be paired with your card templates.
"""

md_path = os.path.join(base_dir, "episode5.md")
with open(md_path, "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
    f.write(md)

# README
readme = """# Episode 5 Export (Canonical, No Assets)

This bundle includes:
- `episode5.json` ‚Äî structured timeline, checkpoints, links, and dialogue.
- `episode5.md` ‚Äî human-readable story recap with timeline and links.

All coordinates, distances, and times are aligned to the user's Google Maps
timeline for 2025-09-01. No image assets are bundled.
"""
with open(os.path.join(base_dir, "README.txt"), "w", encoding="utf-8") as f:
    f.write(readme)

# Zip it
zip_path = "/mnt/data/episode5_canonical_no_assets.zip"
with zipfile.ZipFile(zip_path, "w", zipfile.ZIP_DEFLATED) as z:
    for fn in ["episode5.json", "episode5.md", "README.txt"]:
        z.write(os.path.join(base_dir, fn), arcname=fn)

zip_path
'/mnt/data/episode5_canonical_no_assets.zip'
